Topic.Title: How to merge Gamebook and TA

Posts.EditableText:
This is a way to 'merge' TA and GB:

In TA mode, when ready to switch to gamebook, do:

1. Remove the panes and command line
2. Clear the screen
3. Print the 'page's text.
4. Print a few options, hyperlink it. Eg "Take the orange" will be hyperlinked to "take orange" (objects should be in a dummy room)
5. After choosing an option, clear the screen
6. Print text again etc.

When ready to switch, 

1. Show the panes and command line
2. Clear the screen
3. Show room descriptions

This brings the power of text adventures into gamebooks; and you can have both in a single game. However, the game must be originally a text adventure.
